DbDetails.queryFormat: update hr_expense_header set status=1491 where hr_expense_header_id='%{hr_expense_header_vLst[hr_expense_header_id]}' and status is null and header_amount!=0

DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.hr_expense_header heh LEFT JOIN xbs.sys_pd_header pd ON pd.primary_document='hr_expense_header' AND heh.hr_expense_header_id=pd.primary_document_id AND pd.status!=325
DbDetails.Where: hr_expense_header_id='%{hr_expense_header_vLst[hr_expense_header_id]}' and heh.status=1491 AND sys_pd_header_id IS null
pd.sys_pd_header_id in (select sys_pd_header_id from sys_pd_header where primary_document='hr_expense_header' and primary_document_id='%{hr_expense_header_vLst[hr_expense_header_id]}')
